titles.title: A bill to repeal the increase in withholding from supplemental wage payments included in the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1993.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9122-9123)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1994--Introduced. Repeals the increase in withholding from supplemental wage payments included in the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1993.
